description: Aspose.Email for .NET is a collection of components for working with email from within ASP.NET web applications, web services or Windows applications. It makes it easy to work with Outlook PST, EML, MSG and MHT files.
releaseNotes:
Enhancements

NETWORKNET-34539
Provision of Saving a Message as HTML to Stream with Resources
NETWORKNET-34344
Provision of additional properties in MapiTask from Office 365 (.NET)
NETWORKNET-34405
Provide more flexible implementation of Properties
NETWORKNET-34538
Provision of Saving/Loading Contact
NETWORKNET-34548
Retrieve the mail category while fetching message from exchange
NETWORKNET-34554
Support for setting MapiProperty PT_MV_SHORT, PT_MV_SYSTIME, PT_MV_BOOLEAN and PT_MV_BINARY
NETWORKNET-34564
Create class to keep additional settings for saving MailMessage

summary: Aspose.Email for .NET is a component to work with Email files
title: Aspose.Email for .NET
